apple_vendor_description: This heartwarming emoji on Apple devices depicts a couple embracing, with a prominent red heart symbolizing their love, featuring a woman with medium-dark skin tone and a person with light skin tone.  Apple's characteristic smooth gradients and glossy 3D shading give the figures and the heart a tangible, affectionate quality, enhanced by realistic lighting. It beautifully represents romance, partnership, deep connection, and shared affection between two individuals.
